topic.title: Version 81.4.0.10
topic.abstract:
Released Date: May 2, 2018
In this firmware version, we enhanced the PBX security. This security update will make your Yeastar Cloud PBX more secure and protect it from attacks. We recommend you update the firmware as soon as possible.

section.title: Optimization
section.p: Improved the security of PBX instance.
